Suprarenal Gland.questionText: Regarding the suprarenal glands, one of the following is false:
options: Left suprarenal vein ends in the left renal vein
The left suprarenal gland is triangular in shape
Superior suprarenal artery arises from the inferior phrenic artery
The right suprarenal gland is related to the right lobe of the liver
